post.description: Register a new user and immediately issue login session cookie.
Login user and issue session cookie.

get.description: Return authenticated user profile and plan for UI rendering.

post.description: Logout user by deleting current v1 session token and clearing cookie.

get.description: List all workspaces for the authenticated user.

post.description: Create a workspace for the authenticated user.

put.description: Set the active workspace for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Queue async workspace deletion and return job id for polling.

get.description: List active workspace deletion jobs for the current user.
Get one workspace deletion job status by id.

post.description: Add or refresh a dataset in the workspace DuckDB.
Sync browser-loaded table into workspace dataset catalog/schema metadata.

get.description: List workspace conversations ordered by recency.

post.description: Delete all turns while keeping conversation.
Run analysis in workspace scope and persist a turn.
Stream analysis events using SSE for real-time UI updates.

One-time destructive reset for legacy/users/schema data.

Requires:
  - INQUIRA_ENABLE_RESET=1
  - token matching INQUIRA_RESET_TOKEN
Validate a Gemini key by issuing a lightweight test request.

get.description: Root endpoint to check if API is running
